readme:
#### Unlock the exact automation strategy that took my business from zero to $13K per month—with just one powerful AI workflow. In this step-by-step course, I’ll reveal how I leveraged n8n automation to streamline operations, scale client projects, and generate consistent revenue—completely hands-off.

### Who is this for? 🎯

Entrepreneurs & Agency Owners: Automate your client workflows and scale your business effortlessly.

Freelancers: Boost your income by delivering more projects without more work.

Automation Enthusiasts: Master a game-changing workflow that drives real profits.

### What problem does this solve? 🛠️

Running an agency or freelance business is time-consuming and hard to scale. This proven AI automation handles repetitive tasks, optimizes client interactions, and frees you up to focus on growth, not grunt work.

### What You Will Learn 📘

1️⃣ The $13K/Month Automation Blueprint: Discover the exact workflow I use to generate consistent revenue.  
2️⃣ Client Acquisition on Autopilot: Learn how to attract and onboard clients seamlessly with automation.  
3️⃣ Service Delivery Without the Hassle: Automate project management, follow-ups, and reporting.  
4️⃣ Scale with Confidence: Duplicate the process for multiple clients without extra workload.

### How it works 🌟

1️⃣ Build the Automation: Get step-by-step instructions to set up the n8n workflow.  
2️⃣ Integrate with Tools You Already Use: Connect CRM, email marketing, and project management tools.  
3️⃣ Automate Client Workflows: Delegate repetitive tasks to AI, so you can focus on growth.  
4️⃣ Watch Your Revenue Grow: Effortlessly manage more clients and projects with zero extra effort.

### Setup ⚙️

Connect n8n, OpenAI, and your preferred CRM.

Follow the guided setup—no coding required.

Launch your automated workflow and start scaling.

### Required Tools 🔗

Workflow Automation: n8n

Data Processing: OpenAI

Client Management: HubSpot, ActiveCampaign

Project Tracking: Notion, ClickUp

### Why This Works 🔥

✅ Hands-Off Operations: Automate up to 80% of repetitive tasks.  
✅ Scalable Systems: Onboard more clients without added work.  
✅ Higher Profit Margins: Reduce labor costs and boost efficiency.

🚀 Ready to automate your path to $13K/month? Enroll now and start building your AI-powered business!

readme_zh:
#### 解锁这套自动化策略，让我仅凭一个强大的AI工作流，就将业务从零做到月入1.3万美元。在这门循序渐进的课程中，我将揭秘如何利用n8n自动化简化运营、扩展客户项目并实现持续收益——全程无需动手。

### 适合谁？🎯  
创业者与机构主理人：自动化客户工作流，轻松扩展业务  
自由职业者：无需增加工作量，通过交付更多项目提升收入  
自动化爱好者：掌握真正带来利润的革命性工作流  

### 解决什么问题？🛠️  
经营机构或自由职业耗时且难以扩展。这套经过验证的AI自动化方案能处理重复任务、优化客户互动，让你专注增长而非琐事。  

### 你将学到什么📘  
1️⃣ 月入1.3万刀的自动化蓝图：揭秘我持续创收的完整工作流  
2️⃣ 自动获客系统：用自动化无缝吸引并签约客户  
3️⃣ 无忧交付服务：自动化项目管理、跟进与报告  
4️⃣ 放心扩展：为多个客户复制流程却无需增加工作量  

### 运作原理🌟  
1️⃣ 搭建自动化：获取n8n工作流的分步设置指南  
2️⃣ 对接现有工具：连接CRM、邮件营销与项目管理软件  
3️⃣ 自动化客户流程：将重复任务交给AI，专注业务增长  
4️⃣ 见证收入增长：零额外投入轻松管理更多客户与项目  

### 设置⚙️  
- 连接n8n、OpenAI和你惯用的CRM  
- 跟随引导设置——无需编程基础  
- 启动自动化工作流，开始规模扩张  

### 所需工具🔗  
工作流自动化：n8n  
数据处理：OpenAI  
客户管理：HubSpot、ActiveCampaign  
项目追踪：Notion、ClickUp  

### 为何有效🔥  
✅ 解放双手：80%重复任务实现自动化  
✅ 可扩展系统：新增客户不增工作量  
✅ 更高利润率：降低人力成本，提升效率  

🚀 准备好自动化通往月入1.3万刀的道路了吗？立即报名，打造你的AI驱动事业！
